title: The Nationals Are One Win Away From the World Series
text:
WASHINGTON—Jack Flaherty posted a 0.91 ERA in his 15 outings after the All-Star break, third-best in baseball history. Not even he could stop the Washington Nationals. Right now, nothing could.

With an 8-1 victory in Game 3 of the National League Championship Series on Monday, the Nationals moved to within one win of clinching the franchise’s first-ever pennant. They can complete a sweep of the St. Louis Cardinals on Tuesday, securing a matchup against either the Houston Astros or New York Yankees in the World Series.

...
description: With an 8-1 victory in Game 3 of the National League Championship Series on Monday, the Washington Nationals moved to within one win of clinching the franchise’s first-ever pennant.
